Text:
This is a Swedish torrent site.

Plz use Swe or Eng in description.

The saga tells the disastrous adventures of the Baudelaire Orphans. They are three: Violet, a 14 year old girl to scientific l'intelligence, Klaus, a 12 year old boy who reads unceasingly and Prunille, a small girl who bites all that passes to range of teeth. They were raised by extremely nice parents who disappear in a horrible fire.
va fan e det här det låter som han äter ärtsoppa när han pratar???
